register.name: SRSID
register.description: System Reset Status and ID Register

field.name: LVD
field.description: Reset due to Low Voltage Detect or Power-on

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Reset due to LVD or POR

field.name: LOC
field.description: Reset due to Internal Clock Source Module

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Reset is caused by the ICS module

field.name: PIN
field.description: Reset due to External Reset Pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Reset due to external reset pin

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Reset due to core LOCKUP event

field.name: MDMAP
field.description: Reset due to MDM-AP System Reset Request

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Reset due to System Reset Request bit

field.name: SACKERR
field.description: Reset due to Stop Mode Acknowledge Error\n While entering Stop mode, a reset has been caused by the failure of one or more IICs to acknowledge

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: Reset due to failure to enter Stop mode

field.name: NMIE
field.description: NMI Pin Enable:\n This field can only be written once after any reset

field.name: RSTPE
field.description: RESET Pin Enable:\n This field can only be written once after any reset

field.name: SWDE
field.description: Single Wire Debug Port Pin Enable\n Controls PTA4 as PTA4/ACMP0_OUT or SWD_DIO, PTC4 as PTC4/RTCO/FTM1_CH0/ACMP0_IN2 or SWD_CLK functions

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: PTA4, PTC4 used as GPIO pins

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: PTA4, PTC4 used as SWD pins

field.name: ACTRG
field.description: ACMP Trigger FTM2 selection\n Selects ACMP output used as the trigger0 input of FTM2

field.name: RXDFE
field.description: UART0_RX Filter Select: \n Enables the UART0_RX input to be filtered by ACMP.\n When this function is enabled, any signal tagged with ACMP inputs can be regarded as UART0

field.name: RTCC
field.description: Real-Time Counter on FTM1 input channel 1:\n Allows the Real-time Counter (RTC) overflow to be captured by FTM1 channel 1

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: RTC overflow used as input channel

field.name: ACIC
field.description: Analog Comparator on FTM1 input channel 0:\n Connects the output of ACMP0 to FTM1 input channel 0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: ACMP0_OUT is used as input channel

field.name: RXDCE
field.description: UART0_RX Capture on FTM0 channel 1: \n Enables the UART0_RX to be captured by FTM0 channel 1

field.name: FTMSYNC
field.description: FTM2 Synchronisation Select: \n Generates a PWM synchronisation trigger to the FTM2 module

field.name: TXDME
field.description: UART0_TX Modulation Select:\n Enables the UART0_TX output modulated by FTM0 channel 0

field.name: BUSREF
field.description: BUS Clock Output select: \n Prescaler for bus clock output on PTH2

field.name: CLKOE
field.description: Bus Clock Output Enable:\n Enables bus clock output on PTH2

field.name: ADHWT
field.description: ADC Hardware Trigger Source:\n Selects the ADC hardware trigger source. All trigger sources start ADC conversion on rising-edge

field.name: DLYACT
field.description:
FTM2 Trigger Delay Active:
 This read-only field specifies the status if the FTM2 initial or match delay is active. 
 This field is set when an FTM2 trigger arrives and the delay counter is ticking. 
 Otherwise, this field will be clear

field.name: DELAY
field.description:
FTM2 Trigger Delay:
 Specifies the delay from FTM2 initial or match trigger to ADC hardware trigger when 1 is written to ADHWT.
 The 8-bit modulo value allows the delay from 0 to 255 upon the BUSREF clock settings.
 This is a one-shot counter that starts ticking when the trigger arrives and stops ticking when the counter value reaches the modulo value that is defined

field.name: I2C04WEN
field.description: I2C0 4-Wire Interface Enable\n This field controls I2C0 4-wire interface configuration.\n NOTE: This field works only when SIM_PINSEL0[I2C0PS] is 0

field.name: I2C0OINV
field.description: I2C0 Output Invert in 4-wire mode This field controls inversion of the I2C0 SDA_OUT and SCL_OUT in 4-wire mode

field.name: ACPWTS
field.description: PWT ACMP_OUT select This field select PWTIN2 input signal

field.name: UARTPWTS
field.description: PWT UART RX select This field select PWTIN3 input signal

enumeratedValue.name: 0b00
enumeratedValue.description: UART0 RX is connected to PWTIN3

enumeratedValue.name: 0b01
enumeratedValue.description: UART1 RX is connected to PWTIN3

enumeratedValue.name: 0b10
enumeratedValue.description: UART2 RX is connected to PWTIN3

field.name: IRQPS
field.description: IRQ Port Pin Select Selects the IRQ port pins

field.name: RTCPS
field.description: RTCO Pin Select\n Selects the RTCO port pins

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: PTA3 and PTA2 are mapped as I2C0 pins

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: PTB7 and PTB6 are mapped as I2C0 pins

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: PTB2, PTB3, PTB4, and PTB5 are mapped as SPI0 pins

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: PTE0, PTE1, PTE2, and PTE3 are mapped as SPI0 pins

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: PTB0 and PTB1 are mapped UART0 pins

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: PTA2 and PTA3 are mapped UART0 pins

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: I2C1_SCL on PTE1, I2C1_SDA on PTE0

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: I2C1_SCL on PTH4, I2C1_SDA on PTH3

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: PTD0, PTD1, PTD2, and PTD3 mapped as SPI pins

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: PTG4, PTG5, PTG6, and PTG7 mapped as SPI pins

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: UART1_TX on PTC7, UART1_RX on PTC6

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: UART1_TX on PTF3, UART1_RX on PTF2

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: UART2_TX on PTD7, UART2_RX on PTD6

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: UART2_TX on PTI1, UART2_RX on PTI0

field.name: MSCANPS
field.description: MSCAN Pin Select\n Selects the pins used by MSCAN

enumeratedValue.name: 0b0
enumeratedValue.description: CAN_TX on PTC7, CAN_RX on PTC6

enumeratedValue.name: 0b1
enumeratedValue.description: CAN_TX on PTE7, CAN_RX on PTH2

register.name: UUIDML
register.description: Universally Unique Identifier Middle Low Register

register.name: UUIDMH
register.description: Universally Unique Identifier Middle High Register

field.name: OUTDIV3
field.description: Clock 3 Output Divider value\n This field sets the divide value for the timers(FTM0, FTM2,PWT)

field.name: OUTDIV2
field.description: Clock 2 Output Divider value\n This field sets the divide value for the bus/FLASH, follows OUTDIV1

field.name: OUTDIV1
field.description: Clock 1 Output Divider value\n This field sets the divide value for the core/system clock
